job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # starver TFG20b starver TFG21m # setenv NODEBUG yes FPE_OFF setenv MALLOC_CHECK_ 2 # setup 64b set run = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set dir = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set output = LaserPlots.${run}.root set logFile = ${run}B.log # if ( -r $logFile || -r ${output}) exit 0; if ( -r ${output}) exit 0; root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C(-1,"lana,nodefault")' 'LanaTrees.C+("'${dir}'/*'${run}'*.laser.root","'${output}'")' >& ${logFile}
